name: WLamp
0:
”Alexa,turn on the bedroom lamp.”
”Alexa,turn off the bedroom lamp.”
”Alexa,set the bedroom lamp to green.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
With alexa and WLamp,you can control your lamp just speaking:
"Alexa,turn on the bedroom lamp"
"Alexa,turn off the bedroom lamp"
"Alexa,set the bedroom lamp to green"
"Alexa,set the bedroom lamp to warm white"
"Alexa,dim the bedroom lamp to 50%"
"..."
Let's smart your life with voice.
